price: 18. Reer Caad waxay beeniyeen (Xaqa), ee sidee ahaa cadaabkeygii iyo digniinaheygii.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
